article: addressing the opening session of the #th asia-pacific parliamentarians ' conference on environment and development -lrb- unk -rrb- in hyderabad , #,### kilometers south of here , wang tao , head of china national people 's congress delegation , urged the asia-pacific countries to expand scientific and technological cooperation on environment .
